name: have i been pwned?
description: allows you to check if your email or phone can be found in various data leaks and check for common passwords found in breaches

name: NCSC: Staying Safe Online
description: Tips to ensure you are doing all you can to secure you and your family online from the National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC)

name: KeePass: Password Manager
description: free, open source, light-weight and easy-to-use password manager.

name: uBlock Origin:
description: Free and open-source browser extension for content filtering, including ad blocking. The extension is available for Chrome, Chromium, Edge, Firefox, Opera, Pale Moon, as well as versions of Safari prior to 13

name: Duck Duck Go
description: Privacy focused search engine. Also The DuckDuckGo app includes Web and App Tracking Protection, Smarter Encryption, Private Search, Email Protection, and more
